author: billbarker
msg: Make the message properly empty for the first part of the POST body.

author: remm
msg: - Sync with Cookie, by adding ' ' as a special char. (bug 31090)
- If a special char is present, the string will be quoted. If the client doesn't support it, too bad. No IAE will be thrown.

author: remm
msg: - Remove bad shutdown logic for ms strategy.
